conversations.content: Just a Dragon Gal: Part One
X month, Y day. NOT chill. I had a date with you-know-who today, but Midgardsormr butted in. Mr. Lord-of-Storms... Gimme a break. He CLEARLY couldn't tell there was a storm brewing in my HEART!
X month, Y day. It's haaaaaappening! I gave Midgardsormr a big old Hellfire to solve THAT problemâ€”and THEN I made plans for another date with you-know-who! It's gonna be romantic to the MAX!
X month, Z day. Friends. Me and the other girl dragons went to Myth Avenue and scoped out some date outfits! Jeanne d'Arc also ate more than 278 crepes, which, holy crap, girl. Slow down.
Just a Dragon Gal: Part Two

X month, Y day. TOTAL CRAP. APPARENTLY, Zodiark showed a picture of me when I was a kid to my darling. And it had to be the one when I ruined a sandcastle that Mars had made and he started crying. Rrrrgh!
X month, ZZ day. Amused. The program for this year's party is BANANAS. Also, Hastur made a bunch of copies of himself and they smashed up Ranzal's house! OMG I can't even.
X month, B day. Date TOMORROW! I'm ready, and tomorrow is gonna be all romance and sweetie talk ALL NIGHT with my darling! I'm nothing if not confident now. COME AT ME, TOMORROW! YOU GOT NOTHIN'!
...I said, lying entirely. I'm actually not confident at all. I'm so nervous, I can't sleep.  Keep this a secret from my darling, 'kay?
